remarks: Two ways of exchanging two variables.  Both sides of the biconditional exchange ` x ` and ` y ` , either via two temporary variables ` u ` and ` v ` , or a single temporary ` w ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Sep-2018.)
statement:
sbco4 $p |- ( [ y / u ] [ x / v ] [ u / x ] [ v / y ] ph <-> [ x / w ] [ y / x ] [ w / y ] ph ) $.
$d ph u v $.
$d ph w $.
$d u v x $.
$d u v y $.
$d w x $.
$d w y $.
